participant_abstract.sent: The marketing person, ID, and UID each gave their respective presentations on working design.
We then discussed some specific things regarding basic design.
We made some decisions and left some others pending.

participant_decisions.sent: Will be marketed towards young demographic.
Emphasis will be on basic functions with other functions in sub-menus.
Company colours/logo will be visible at 'boott-up' of remote.

participant_problems.sent: Lithium batteries might not be eco-friendly.
Too many functions equals high materials cost who really wants touch-screen???
What am i supposed to be doing now???
